com.qtplaf.library.util

Class Calendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Calendar
      • java.util.GregorianCalendar
        • com.qtplaf.library.util.Calendar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<java.util.Calendar>

    public class Calendar
extends java.util.GregorianCalendar
    A Calendar implements a more natural use of a GregorianCalendar.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
